scripts.package: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output pomodoro-linux --config package.json
scripts.package-all: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output pomodoro --config package.json
scripts.package-windows: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output pomodoro-win.exe --config package.json
scripts.package-macos: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output pomodoro-macos --config package.json
scripts.package-linux: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output pomodoro-linux --config package.json
